name: Crimson Orchard Dried Cherries
description: Indulge in the tart-sweet elegance of Crimson Orchard Dried Cherries. Gently sun-dried at peak ripeness, these plump cherries burst with natural flavor and a satisfying chew. Perfect for snacking straight from the bag, sprinkling over salads, or elevating your morning oatmeal, they’re free from added sugars and preservatives. Sourced from select family orchards in the Pacific Northwest, each batch is hand-selected for quality. Enjoy a wholesome treat that’s as nutritious as it is delicious.

attributes.allergen_info: Processed in a facility that also handles tree nuts
